title: Wallau
content:
**[Indicies](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829041541/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indicies) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829041541/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Wallau**

[Klingspor](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829041541/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klingspor) typeface designed by [Rudolf Koch](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829041541/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rudolf%20Koch) from 1924–1930. Images from the 1939 type specimen at [http://www.typeoff.de/?p=29](http://web.archive.org/web/20130829041541/http:/www.typeoff.de/?p=29)
author: dan_reynolds
